statements: SELECT event_name, event_date, event_time FROM event_notifications WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM event_notifications WHERE event_date > '2022-09-01';
SELECT event_id, event_name, recipient_email FROM event_notifications WHERE recipient_email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT event_name, description FROM event_notifications WHERE event_name LIKE 'Birth%';
SELECT event_name, event_time, recipient_email FROM event_notifications ORDER BY event_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM event_notifications ORDER BY event_date DESC, event_time ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT event_name, description, recipient_email FROM event_notifications WHERE event_id = 1
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM event_notifications WHERE description LIKE '%important%'
SELECT * FROM event_notifications WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01' AND recipient_email = 'example@email.com'
SELECT event_id, event_name, event_time FROM event_notifications ORDER BY event_time DESC
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_datetime FROM events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM events WHERE event_datetime > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_description, notification_type FROM events INNER JOIN email_notifications ON events.event_id = email_notifications.event_id;
SELECT event_name, notification_type, notification_message FROM events INNER JOIN email_notifications ON events.event_id = email_notifications.event_id WHERE event_datetime < '2022-06-01';
SELECT event_name, event_datetime FROM events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM events ORDER BY event_datetime DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM events WHERE event_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM events WHERE event_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT e.event_name, en.email_address FROM events e JOIN email_notifications en ON e.event_id = en.event_id;
SELECT * FROM EventReminders;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventReminders ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT event_name, reminder_date FROM EventReminders WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM EventParticipants WHERE participant_name LIKE '%Alice%';
SELECT notification_subject, notification_body FROM EmailNotifications JOIN EventReminders ON EmailNotifications.event_id = EventReminders.event_id ORDER BY notification_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM EventReminders WHERE event_date > NOW()
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM EventReminders WHERE reminder_date < NOW()
SELECT participant_name, participant_email FROM EventParticipants ORDER BY participant_name DESC
SELECT event_name, event_date, reminder_date FROM EventReminders ORDER BY event_date ASC
SELECT notification_subject, notification_body FROM EmailNotifications
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT attendee_name, attendee_email FROM attendees WHERE event_id = 1;
SELECT log_id, action_performed, timestamp FROM log ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT event_name, event_description FROM events WHERE event_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT event_name, event_date, attendee_name FROM events JOIN attendees ON events.event_id = attendees.event_id;
SELECT event_name, notification_type, notification_content FROM events JOIN notifications ON events.event_id = notifications.event_id;
SELECT * FROM events;
SELECT event_name, event_date FROM events ORDER BY event_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, full_name FROM users WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user_events WHERE notification_sent = true;
SELECT event_id, user_id, subscription_date FROM event_subscribers WHERE event_id = 'f4d9f559-0dd7-4eb0-b900-2fbb870d474b' ORDER BY subscription_date;
SELECT * FROM events WHERE event_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, email, full_name FROM users ORDER BY full_name DESC;
SELECT event_name, event_location FROM events WHERE event_date <= '2021-06-30' AND event_location LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT * FROM user_events WHERE notification_sent = TRUE AND notification_date >= '2021-08-01';
SELECT event_name, full_name FROM events JOIN user_events ON events.event_id = user_events.event_id JOIN users ON user_events.user_id = users.user_id ORDER BY event_name ASC, full_name DESC;
